sentence.Network_en: I dropped a quarter into the slot of the pay phone.
sentence.Network_cn: 我向付费电话的投币孔里投了一枚25分硬币。

sentence.Network_en: Next time use a pay phone and call me.
sentence.Network_cn: 下次,用公用电话给我打电话.

sentence.Network_en: I tried to find a pay phone, but the receiver broke down.
sentence.Network_cn: 我想找个投币电话的, 但是话筒坏掉了.

RelatedPhrase.word: I wonder if there's a pay phone in this building

list.key: I wonder if there's a pay phone in this building
list.exp: 我不知道这栋大楼里有没有付费电话
list.abs: 152.I wonder if you could pass me the salt? 能不能把盐递给我一下。153.I wonder if there's a pay phone in this building. 我不知道这栋大楼里有没有付费电话。154.I wonder if it will snow tomorrow. 我想知道明天会不会下雪。
